subproject.description: The flooding caused by the Attaabad incident has displaced 6,000 people from upstream villages, stranded a further 25,000 and damaged further 16 miles of Karakoram Highway including 310 Metre long KKH Bridge. On the request of GBDMA, UNDP Pakistan intends to support the IDPs emerging from the incident by implementing this project. The total beneficiaries will be more than 5,000 individuals.
subproject.title: CPR-Supp Landslide IDPs Hunza

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacity to respond to gender-based violence and to increase women’s civic engagement, participation and leadership in crisis prevention, ongoing crisis and post-crisis contexts

title: Support Landslide IDPs in Hunza Nagar and Gilgit Distric
